DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of the research study is to use recordings of brain electrical activity (through electroencephalogram, or EEG) and symptom measurements to determine whether patients are likely to show a response to medication or placebo treatment during a treatment trial for depression.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Medication and Placebo Response in Major Depression
DOC.criteria: Clinical Diagnosis of Unipolar Major Depression Substance Abuse, Psychotic Disorder, History of Severe Head Trauma
